body:
Thanks @il-ch, sorry I was mistaken (not related to IB as the fabric is UDP-IP-ETH).
So I recommend we set the highest number from hop_limit (0xFF).
I think this the case when you set hop_limit=1 in RoCE (I think this code is in the verbs).
